Service Details: - Provides prepared, frozen meals that can be heated in a microwave or a regular oven- Can be delivered with the hot meal delivery service for use on days when Meals on Wheels is not delivering- Operated by Interior Health's Food Services Department- Can accommodate low sodium, diabetic, gluten free, renal, minced, soft and pureed food diets; please call to discuss other special diet particulars
Hours: Kelowna Meal Delivery:  Mon-Fri: 11:00am - 1:00pmWest Kelowna Meal Delivery:  Mon, Wed, Fri: 11:00am - 12:30pm
Eligibility: - Seniors age 55 and up, those who are home bound, have a disability, and/or are unable to access nutritious meals- Those recovering from surgery may quality; please call to discuss your situation
Cost: * $7.50 per meal * DVA clients might qualify for the meal program * if approved meals will be paid for * contact us and your service provider for additional details
Address & Map: May Bennett Wellness Center135 Davie RdKelowna, BC     V1X 1Y8View MapQuest Map
